name: Cobbery
headline: AI Agents to Scale Your Outbound Phone Ops
description: Cobbery hand-crafts AI phone agents for your business to scale operations and reduce operating costs.

founders.name: Alex Pickett, Founder
founders.description: I'm a computer engineer who is a huge fan of building cool things, freakonomics, and video games!

markdown:
raw_markdown="# AI Agents to Scale Your Outbound Phone Ops
Cobbery hand-crafts AI phone agents for your business to scale outbound operations and reduce operating costs.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/i8k23RZTvE2YCsAhiseXTcyFY.png?scale-down-to=2048)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/i8k23RZTvE2YCsAhiseXTcyFY.png?scale-down-to=2048)
###### Talk to a Cobbery Agent now:
We’ll pretend you’re a rental property manager, so you can see how Cobbery agents converse.
Call
###### Talk to a Cobbery Agent now:
We’ll pretend you’re a rental property manager, so you can see how Cobbery agents converse.
Call
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/r3Foay2qbqOHc5NorUcvMfrDOFA.png)
Don't worry, we won't call you again (unless you ask)
No, Thanks
I'll leave an email
Don't worry, we won't call you again
No, Thanks
I'll leave an email
I'll leave an email
## Listen for yourself:AI agents, indistinguishable from humans.
## An outbound call center in a box.
## An outbound call center in a box.
A one-stop solution for calling at scale, without the overhead
A one-stop solution for calling at scale, without the overhead
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/GncZn6JtBa5sC5OSJshVJ5WrY.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/GncZn6JtBa5sC5OSJshVJ5WrY.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/GncZn6JtBa5sC5OSJshVJ5WrY.png)
#### A/B Test the perfect agent.
Find the perfect combination of persona, voice, phone number, and more to see what connects the best with contacts.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Tfptbe8n88my1Mv2Pv4opqpjXWo.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Tfptbe8n88my1Mv2Pv4opqpjXWo.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Tfptbe8n88my1Mv2Pv4opqpjXWo.png)
#### Voicemails and returned calls.
Cobbery agents leave rich voicemails and take returned calls to maximize connection rates and conversational immersion.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/k6mVc2rgrGgdvsBMGIn4l64diOs.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/k6mVc2rgrGgdvsBMGIn4l64diOs.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/k6mVc2rgrGgdvsBMGIn4l64diOs.png)
#### SmartSchedule: always finds a time.
SmartSchedule automatically finds an optimal time to call, even giving a call back when asked.
## These forward-thinking companies scaled their outbound phone ops with Cobbery.
## These forward-thinking companies scaled their outbound phone ops with Cobbery.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/TOBEhOChZbTXQ3VNyvCmapXVpHA.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/TOBEhOChZbTXQ3VNyvCmapXVpHA.png)
#### Uses Cobbery to Recover high-value customers at scale
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/5sd3a149fsEfjIsLPb2Wt1SD7Q.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/5sd3a149fsEfjIsLPb2Wt1SD7Q.png)
#### Delivers tailored phone-powered AI SDRs for the largest companies on earth
## Conversational Immersion:”Are you a bot?” is a thing of the past.
Cobbery agents have the unmatched conversational immersion: It feels like you’re talking to a real human.
## Run Cobbery anywhere, and connect with anything
## Run Cobbery anywhere, and connect with anything
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/UUrWOgBJOPftwxdZJ1luCBgSWeM.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/UUrWOgBJOPftwxdZJ1luCBgSWeM.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/UUrWOgBJOPftwxdZJ1luCBgSWeM.png)
#### Managed, in your cloud, or in your datacenters
Use our managed Cobbery for maximum convenience, or run it in your cloud or datacenters for maximum access control.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ZFBxjBR4zo4AqrWEFFkAG7YLNE.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/aHSp3LkrCLC3uzrRJBqozZgs7o.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/aHSp3LkrCLC3uzrRJBqozZgs7o.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/aHSp3LkrCLC3uzrRJBqozZgs7o.png)
#### Integrate with all your tools
Automatically launch jobs and enrich your other tools with results. If you don't see the integration you need, we'll make it.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/IYxdXftKkJnKoPZ5qlXMh4Sb94w.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pG23p8jLNE5ZR6v2fjJpAYZQFw.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pG23p8jLNE5ZR6v2fjJpAYZQFw.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pG23p8jLNE5ZR6v2fjJpAYZQFw.png)
#### Protect your data with purpose-built features
Cobbery offers advanced data redaction and PII deletion capabilities to ensure your sensitive information remains confidential and compliant, without deleting action history.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/PsvgENHiJFQ3cTFYHVFwdzX8NBQ.png)
## Use Cobbery to unlock scale
## Use Cobbery to unlock scale
## Use Cobbery to unlock scale
Build impossible data sets
Calling over 11,000 LIHC properties in the US is a monumental task with Cobbery, it takes only a few days.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/keR97SXkQElVVUU3OTxFddUBnrs.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/keR97SXkQElVVUU3OTxFddUBnrs.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/keR97SXkQElVVUU3OTxFddUBnrs.png)
International Calling Support
Cobbery supports calling from anywhere, to anywhere, so you can reach anyone.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VxtJrGEMK8mBZEfN7tMFze8P4w.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VxtJrGEMK8mBZEfN7tMFze8P4w.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VxtJrGEMK8mBZEfN7tMFze8P4w.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/h0ObSz6YWyJPeSbBAadpMfXfkg.png?scale-down-to=2048)
## Ready to dive in?
Start your Cobbery journey with our intake Agent and hear the magic for yourself
[](https://cobbery.com/<./#header>)
No, Thanks
I'll leave an email
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/h0ObSz6YWyJPeSbBAadpMfXfkg.png?scale-down-to=2048)

' fit_markdown='' fit_html=''
generated_description:
Cobbery is a startup based in San Francisco, founded in 2020, and part of Y Combinator's Batch S22. Their mission is clear: to craft AI agents that scale outbound phone operations for businesses while reducing operational costs. With a small but nimble team of four, Cobbery is positioned to deliver a powerful solution designed for efficient communication.

Imagine having an entire outbound call center in a box—Cobbery provides just that. Their AI phone agents are designed to engage in conversations that feel remarkably human-like, eliminating the classic "are you a bot?" question altogether. Their technology allows businesses to make large-scale outbound calls without the traditional overhead associated with call centers.

Cobbery’s offerings go beyond just making connections; they provide features like SmartSchedule, which automatically finds the best times to call, leaving room for rich voicemails, clever A/B testing to optimize agent performance, and the ability to manage data securely with advanced redaction and deletion capabilities. 

Their technology integrates smoothly with various tools, allowing companies to enhance their existing workflows. They've already made waves by serving some of the largest organizations, demonstrating their capacity to handle significant calling projects efficiently—like reaching out to over 11,000 properties in just days.

If you're looking to scale your outbound operations without the typical headaches, Cobbery’s AI phone agents might be your solution. You can visit their website at [cobbery.com](https://cobbery.com) to explore more about how they can help you leverage AI for smarter communications.
